TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1245
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Alcalde of San Felipe, 01-04-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1245

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Order for archives.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[*date_mentioned n="01-04-1826">January 4,1826*/date_mentioned*?]*/p* *p*The *person_mentioned*Alcalde of the *location_mentioned*district of San Felipe*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* is hereby directed to deliver over to the *person_mentioned*Alcalde of the *location_mentioned*district of Victoria*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* which formerly was a part of said *location_mentioned*district of San Felipe*/location_mentioned* all papers documents or certified transcripts of papers which properly belong to said *location_mentioned*district of Victoria*/location_mentioned* and take a receipt for the same*/p*
*/div1*
